thread.title: Microsoft’s Parchi app lets you take notes from lockscreen
thread.title_full: Microsoft’s Parchi app lets you take notes from lockscreen

title: Microsoft’s Parchi app lets you take notes from lockscreen
text:
Microsoft’s Parchi app lets you take notes from lockscreen 
Times Of India Friday 23rd October, 2015 
NEW DELHI: Microsoft Garage - a lab that lets employees work on projects of their choice - has released Parchi, an app that lets users take notes on their Android smartphones directly from the lockscreen....
